properties.name: storage.data-directory
properties.description: Directory for job input and output storage

properties.name: storage.model-directory
properties.description: Directory in which model JSON files are located

properties.name: scanners.model-refresh-frequency
properties.description: Frequency with which to scan for new or altered model JSON

properties.name: scanners.completed-job-frequency
properties.description: Frequency with which to parse the slurm queue for potentially completed jobs

properties.name: scanners.start-job-frequency
properties.description: Frequency with which to scan pending jobs to start with slurm
